chunk_text:
Please discuss this with the event manager. #### Can I bring decorations, food time, rental or personal event items ahead of time or pick up the following day? No. We only allow LED lighted candles, lanterns, or votives. #### What about candles, sparklers, fireworks, Chinese lanterns or anything combustible? Shepard hooks and wine barrels may be used. We do not allow any
heaters, fire pits, fireworks, seeds, fake flower petals, confetti or any chemicals that can damage the lawns or walkways.
